items.title: Appeals court upholds disqualification of Alina Habba as US attorney for New Jersey
items.description: A federal appeals court has disqualified President Trump's former personal attorney Alina Habba from serving as the U.S. attorney for New Jersey.

items.title: Plane skids off icy runway as snow snarls post-Thanksgiving travel
items.description: Overall, more than 1,400 flights across the country were canceled Saturday, with the majority due to weather hitting the upper Midwest, according to F...

items.title: National Guardsmen shooting suspect: Afghan commander's death, financial woes surface
items.description: The death of the commander -- whom Rahmanullah Lakanwal is said to have revered -- had deeply saddened the suspect, sources said.

items.title: WATCH:  Bear enjoys fresh snowfall at Chicago zoo
items.description: A resident bear at Brookfield Zoo Chicago took delight in the fresh snowfall over the weekend, rolling around in the snow.

items.title: WATCH:  Electric-blue ribbon eel stuns divers off the coast of Indonesia
items.description: Divers were treated to an unusual sight in the waters near Bali: a blue ribbon eel gracefully undulating through the sea.
